data.title: Kiss Me Goodbye
data.meta_description: "Kiss Me Goodbye" is a song by Michele Vanni under the alias Michael Beat, being his return to Eurobeat but the only song under the alias and last at the genre. Produced by Laurent Newfield and written by Clara Moroni in 2000, the song was released the same year in "Super Eurobeat Vol. 112" on...
data.text:
"Kiss Me Goodbye" is a song by Michele Vanni under the alias Michael Beat, being his return to Eurobeat but the only song under the alias and last at the genre. Produced by Laurent Newfield and written by Clara Moroni in 2000, the song was released the same year in "Super Eurobeat Vol. 112" on October 25, 2000, and later it was released together "Rebel Heart" by Mako, "Dancing Crazy" by D. Essex, and "Crazy Night" by Boys Band in a vinyl maxi-single released by DMI on March 2001.

Lyrics[]

[Intro]

Woah, woah, Kiss Me Goodbye

(Kiss Me Goodbye)

(Make you mine, tonight)

(Don't ask me why)

(Be all right!)

Woah, woah, woah!

Woah, woah, woah!

[Verse 1]

Stay, I want you to stay

At least for today

You know that I'm sentimental

Now, you listen to me

'Cause I'm gonna be

The one that will breaking your heart

[Pre-Chorus]

I need to be all alone (all alone)

I need to walk on my own (on my own)

Thank you for all that you've done

I will keep you always in my heart

And my mind

[Chorus]

Kiss Me Goodbye

I don't know, if I wanna make you mine, tonight

Don't ask me why

'Cause I know, that you're gonna be all right

Kiss Me Goodbye

I don't know, if I wanna make you mine, tonight

Don't ask me why

'Cause I know, that you're gonna be all right

Woah, woah, woah!

Woah, woah, woah!

Kiss Me Goodbye

[Verse 2]

Cry, now you're gonna cry

And I can't deny

It's hard to say goodbye, baby

Hand, just give me your hand

You will understand

You couldn't be my gold angel

Featured on[]

Year Version Album Track No. 2000 Kiss Me Goodbye [4-Min Ver] Super Eurobeat Vol. 112 Track 2 Kiss Me Goodbye [Mixed] The Best Of Super Eurobeat 2000 ~Non-Stop Megamix~ Disc 1, Track 10 2001 Kiss Me Goodbye (Movie Size) Initial D The Movie Original Sound Tracks Track 11 Kiss Me Goodbye [Extended] Track 29 2020 Kiss Me Goodbye (Extended Mix) Super Eurobeat Presents Initial D World Hits Selection 1 Track 10 2023 Eurobeat Masters Singles: Pink Collection 1 Track 13 Kiss Me Goodbye (Instrumental) Track 14 Kiss Me Goodbye (Acapella) Track 15 Kiss Me Goodbye (Bonus Edit) Track 16 2024 Kiss Me Goodbye [Extended] Initial Delta Eurobeat Soundtrack Vol. 1 Track 11

Singles[]

DELTA 1090 - 2001[]

Kiss Me Goodbye, Rebel Heart, Dancing Crazy and Crazy Night were on the DELTA 1090 vinyl in 2001.

Side Song Artist Length A1 Rebel Heart (Extended Mix) Mako 5:43 A2 Dancing Crazy (Extended Mix) D.Essex 5:55 B1 Crazy Night (Extended Mix) Boys Band 6:23 B2 Kiss Me Goodbye (Extended Mix) Michael Beat 4:39

DMIEMS023 - 2022[]

Then Kiss Me Goodbye had a digital release on Eurobeat Masters Single in 2022.

Track Song Length 1 Kiss Me Goodbye (Extended) 4:41 2 Kiss Me Goodbye (Instrumental) 4:41 3 Kiss Me Goodbye (Acapella) 2:33 4 Kiss Me Goodbye (Bonus Edit) 2:32

Trivia[]

Kiss Me Goodbye was featured in Initial D Third Stage.

The song was not listed in the credits.
